title: Help needed
content:
If you have encountered a crash when inputting text in Pixquare on iOS 26, please let us know via Discord or email (info@pixquare.art).
We'd love to learn about how this happens and fix it.
Thank you so much
Pixquare Team.

title: -- NEW YEAR SALE --
content:
Use code '2026' for 30% off.

Get your full access now before this discount is gone!!!

title: Bug in 2.64.0
content:
There is a known bug in v2.64.0 that prevents you from changing the brush size. We have found the root cause and submitted a new version for approval to resolve this issue.

We are sorry for the inconvenience, and thank you so much for understanding.

Pixquare Team.
